Full Description: Bently Holdings is a private asset holdings and management company. Bently Holdings oversee real property investments, and operate under strict green business practices with little to no debt. Careful selection and superb care for our tenants is of the utmost importance — as are the employees we choose to represent Bently Holdings. Bently Holdings has even mandated that sheet rock, aluminum studs, nails, and concrete are to come from recycled materials. All demolition must be recycled as well, they constantly strive to have 0% waste going to land fills.  Bently Holdings is committed to using environmentally friendly paint products which contain no VOC’s (Volatile Organic Compounds). They are voluntarily upgrading all older, less environmentally friendly building systems such as HVAC chiller units to systems that not only emit near zero harmful emissions, but run on considerably less energy.  Bently Holdings cannot afford to operate any other way. Try as they might, it’s impossible to become completely carbon neutral— this is why Bently Holdings donates to complete carbon neutrality the amount they are not able to reduce. This is something every business can do right now, today. It is their responsibility to do what’s right, to take the initiative and make our world a cleaner and safer place.  Bently Holdings plans to change the direction of real estate in the entire Bay Area towards a more responsible viewpoint, and to restore environmental integrity to the business.
